description:
Komi decides to write a letter to Najimi to clear up a misunderstanding, but she might be too nervous to give it to them.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Gokai Desu. / Genkaku Desu. / Narcissist Desu. / Shuugakuryokou no Hangime Desu.
It`s Just a Misunderstanding. / It`s Just a Hallucination. / It`s Just a Narcissist. / It`s Just a Group Decision for the School Field Trip.
誤解です. / 幻覚です. / ナルシストです. / 修学旅行の班決めです.
